io.github.rowak

Class Aurora.State

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.Aurora.State
  • Enclosing class:
    Aurora

    public class Aurora.State
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods for accessing and modifying Aurora state information.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      State()
      Initializes this State object by requesting the Aurora's on value.
